text: Yes I got it, thank you. If you can leave an example from what wasn’t working that would be helpful

Another question
I have a monthly recurring email for multiple blogs (custom rss email as 1 email contains posts from multiple blogs). If no blogs have been published for that month - Is there a way in which that email does not send?
If nothing has been published to the feed, no email will send

Hi everybody, I'm new to the HubSpot journey but familiar with development. I've got to grips with Hubl and its functionality but I'd like to return a phone number of a deal owner within a custom built email in Design Manager. Does anybody know if this is possible? So far I can only reach the Owner name following deal.HubSpot_owner_id. Any insight is much appreciated :slightly_smiling_face:
It’s seems the answer is no. As a workaround I created a field in the deal screen for an agents ordered number for contact. That way they can specify ddi or mobile.
